item.title: Building a Multi-Agent Swarm with OpenAI's Swarm Framework
item.description:
OpenAI’s Swarm is an experimental framework for building multi-agent systems. Unlike heavier frameworks, Swarm is intentionally minimalâ€”it adds just two concepts on top of the Chat Completions API: handoffs and routines. This makes it easy to understand and extend.

In this article, we’ll build a customer service system where specialized agents hand off conversations to each other based on customer needs.

What is Swarm?

Swarm is OpenAI’s take on multi-agent orchestration. Key principles:
